subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After a bitter public divorce and a period of mediocrity on the track, Jeff Gordon and his new wife are expecting their first child in July and Gordon has found victory lane once again.
snippet: After a bitter public divorce and a period of mediocrity on the track, Jeff Gordon and his new wife are expecting their first child in July and Gordon has found victory lane once again.
